product_name: Rossignol Axium JR 70 Downhill Ski Bindings - Juniors
long_description: Rossignol Axium JR 70 downhill ski bindings are built for young, intermediate skiers, weighing between 49 - 154 lbs., who can benefit from top-performance bindings as they progress in their skills. Toe pieces are designed so the boots are guided naturally into position, making bindings simple to step into in most situations. Heels feature easy entry and exit, so kids can get into their skis quickly. The Rossignol Axium JR 70 downhill ski bindings include 85mm-wide brakes that fit up to 80mm ski widths. DIN range 2 - 7.
short_description: Rossignol Axium JR 70 downhill ski bindings are built for young, intermediate skiers, weighing between 49 - 154 lbs., who can benefit from top-performance bindings as they progress in their skills.
